oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Greene, Campbell Notes
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; Civil War;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: (Series of notes concerning quarrel between Greene and Col. Campbell) To Col. Campbell from Colton Greene: censures assault upon Greene's character and challenges Campbell to a duel; names Col. Slayback as second; further notes from C. C. Rainwater (an additional second) to the effect that Campbell has disappeared and never responded to communication; memo in pencil; "Col. Campbell died during the month as I recall the facts. CG."
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
